mapper.select: select count(*) from msg where msg_sender = #{msg_receiver} and msg_receiver='administrator' and msg_title like '%[1:1문의]%' and receiver_del=0

select * from (select msg.*, row_number() over(order by msg_date desc) rnum from msg where msg_sender = #{msg_receiver} and msg_receiver = 'administrator' and msg_title like '%[1:1문의]%' and receiver_del=0) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count (*) from msg where msg_title like '%[1:1문의]%' and msg_sender != 'administrator' and sender_del=0

select * from(select msg.*,row_number() over(order by msg_date desc) rnum from msg where msg_title like '%[1:1문의]%' and msg_sender != 'administrator' and sender_del=0) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update msg set msg_view=#{msg_view} where msg_seq=#{msg_seq}
